  • Fujifilm X-H1

Fujifilm X-H1

The flagship in their renowned range of X-Series mirrorless cameras, the Fujifilm X-H1 is the first X-series camera to feature in-body image stabilisation, and it does so at up to 5.5 stops of compensation. The Fuji X-H1 is a professional level mirrorless camera with a rugged and durable build quality that features, among other things, 4K video at up to 200 Mbps output, dual SD card slots, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, and F-Log recording at 4K directly to the SD card.

Weighing only 673g (with battery and memory cards), the X-H1 has been built around the needs of professionals, fulfilling the desires of both photographers and videographers alike.

    Key Features

  • 5-axis in-body image stabilisation up to 5.5 stops of compensation
  • 24.3 Megapixel APS-C X-Trans CMOS III sensor with no low-pass filter
  • High speed X-Processor Pro image processing engine
  • Uses 25% thicker magnesium alloy compared to X-T2 for more robust build
  • Additional 1.28 inch sub-LCD on top of the camera
  • Large grip design with a new shape & leaf-spring switch on the shutter release button
  • Quietest shutter of all X-Series cameras
  • New ETERNA film simulation mode for shooting movies with a cinematic film appearance
  • X-H1 now records at up to 200 Mbps bit rate
  • New F-Log to SD card recording
  • New DCI 4K video recording at 4096x2160 resolution
  • New 400% dynamic range setting (approx. 12 stops)
  • New 200Mbps high bit rate recording & new high-sound quality internal microphone at 24 bit/48 kHz) and verbal time codes.

Pre-Order Now

Be the first to see the Fujifilm X-H1 - today in our London Store from 8-4pm

Meet the Fujifilm X-H1 In-Store - Today from 8am to 4pm in London

Join us for breakfast and a coffee today and be one of the first people in the UK to get your hands on the brand new X-H1, the most advanced mirrorless in the Fuji X series.

Our London store on Rathbone Place will be open early from 8am - 4pm today for you to come along and get hands-on with the new Fuji X-H1. Technical Experts from Fuji will be on hand all day to answer your questions.

Saturday 17th February in Burgess Hill

If you can't make it to our London store today or you live further away, we'll be holding another Fuji Breakfast for the X-H1 this Saturday 17th February at our Burgess Hill store in West Sussex.
